description: Two storey side extension; part single, part two storey rear extension; alteration of roof from hip to gable end, rear roof extensionto main roofslope; and installation of five rooflights
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):  TG-P200 Rev C, TG-P201 Rev B, TG-P205 Rev C
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials and finishing to be used in the development shall be consistent with those as listed within Section 9 of the submitted application form and the plans as listed in Condition (2) and match the existing property.

Reason: 	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 (h)(j), 1.2 (f), 2.1 and 2.10, and policies 7.1, 7.2, 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2015).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (2016), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012
